request.description: This API calls provides a way to fetch the user id for a user with name 'portaluser'.

This API calls provides a way to fetch the username when given a userid. The value for the parameter userid has been parameterized, for ease of demonstrating the API behavior. Please substitute a user name that you want to run the API call for.

This API returns all the existing pools in a Tenant. We capture pool Id for a pool with name 'vdi'. This can be changed in the Tests section. 

There are three pools that are standard and always present. These are: 
- Pool Name: Utility Servers ; Pool Id: 999,
- Pool Name: Imported Desktops; Pool Id: 1000,
- Pool Name: Pattern Desktops; Pool Id: 1001 and
- Pool Name: Recycle Pool; Pool Id: 1002.
This API calls fetches the id for a user group that contains the string *portalusers*.
